O

OBSTACLE_TEX - Static variable in class com.berbils.game.tools.AssetLoader
 
onDeath() - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.FireEngine
Method called to represent fire engine death, updates scores, the current screen shown and what state the game will be in after the screens shown.
onDeath() - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.patrols.AlienPatrol
Called when it is hit by a water projectile and the tower it belongs to is destroyed
onDeath() - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.towers.Tower
Called upon tower death Updates the screen counter for towers alive If the tower is the last one alive the game screen is updated to the game won screen Else if the tower is not the last one alive, an explosion is created and the towers body, fixture and sprite destroyed.
onFireStation - Variable in class com.berbils.game.entities.FireEngine
A boolean that determines whether F can be pressed to enter the fire station.
originalSpeedLimit - Variable in class com.berbils.game.entities.FireEngine
A constant speed multiplier used by the InputManager to change the amount of force applied and therefore the speed
